SELECT DISTINCT b.menuid, b.menuname, b.iconcls,b.parentid,b.request,b.sortno, b.leaf,decode(length(b.menuid),4,'true','false') as isRoot, decode(b.expanded,'1','true','0','false',null) as expanded,'1' as authorizelevel, decode(b.icon,null,'tab_blank.png',b.icon) as icon FROM eamenu b WHERE b.menuid like '$menuid$%' ORDER BY b.sortno asc

SELECT DISTINCT b.menuid, b.menuname, b.iconcls,b.parentid,b.request,b.sortno, b.leaf,if(length(b.menuid)=4, 'true', 'false') as isRoot, case b.expanded when '1' then 'true' when '0' then 'false' else null end as expanded,'1' as authorizelevel, if(length(b.icon)>1, b.icon, 'tab_blank.png ') as icon FROM eamenu b WHERE b.menuid like '$menuid$%' ORDER BY b.sortno asc
